short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An interactive quiz and study tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our flashcard tool offers a seamless way to practice and review user-added questions. Enhance your study sessions with an integrated to-do list that helps you keep track of tasks. Whether you're preparing for exams or just learning new material, this extension makes studying efficient organized, and simple.
